To truly blossom, this collective of emerging creators and indiepreneurs require a larger support network of individuals, studios, and organizations.

If you’d like to join our budding community of individual partners committed to the advancement of the next generation creators who are shaping the grammer of creative expression: support a fellow

Is there an amount that I should contribute?

While there are no rigid tiers, we’ve created a guide for what different contribution amount can cover:

  • $100 - indiepreneur friend - sponsors our communal software
  • $500 - indiepreneur advocate - sponsors toolings for a rising creator
  • $1,500 - indiepreneur partner - supports a rising creator for a month
  • $9,000 - indiepreneur patron - supports a rising creator for a residency

Your contribution goes to establishing the success of this collective and the rising indiepreneurs.

We are a self-organized group of committed creators shaping and exploring the grammar of creative expressions. Your contribution is vital because it is what gives these efforts life force and momentum.

What are other ways I can contribute?

Our collective is composed of a group of creators working with different media and we could all benefit from having additional guidance and support. While we don’t have a laundry list of ways for you to support us, here’s a small guide of how you might be able to support us:
  • Mentorship - have dialogues with us and provide us with guidance as we find our footing and voice as creators and indiepreneurs (this can be an one-time or a recurring engagement depending on your availability)
  • Opportunities -
  • Resources - As much as this is a journey to finding our footing, it is also a process of exploring and tinkering with ideas and tools.

What do I get as an individual partner?

If you are interested in becoming a studio or organizational partner and would like to explore ways in supporting, accessing, and collaborating with rising indiepreneurs, please contact us at partnership@tinyfactories.space For any other questions related to gifting, sponsorship, and parntership, please email: partnership@tinyfactories.space
